title: tried to enter a game It became all dark
body:
tried to enter a game It became all dark
dispay not showing sound working

replies.body: Those completely black loading screens can be a sign that the client wasn't able to get a solid connection with our game servers for some reason. Let's flush your dns and make sure you have port forwarding set up, but also be sure to go through the rest of the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network can get a clear signal.
